QuestData.Title: The Fall of Taunka'le Village
QuestData.Description: We are lost, $n. This place has been our home for many generations, but it is no longer safe. There remains only death... Death and a memory of what used to be.$B$BI have called for the evacuation of Taunka'le. All remaining taunka must leave at once and make their way to our capital city, Icemist, located in the Dragonblight.$B$B<Wintergale points east.>$B$BYou must help get my people to safety, $n. Mother Tauranook awaits you at the village gates. Hurry! The Scourge closes in from all sides!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Mother Tauranook outside the gates of Taunka'le Village.
QuestData.RewardText: <Mother Tauranook wipes her tears away.>$B$BThere was once a time when I could walk across this tundra and the snow would fill my view for as far as I could see.$B$BBut the snow has left us - signaling that our time here has come to an end. We leave behind Taunka'le Village and the Borean Tundra with many happy memories...$B$B<Mother Tauranook whimpers.>$B$BPerhaps the future will welcome our return - along with the snow.
